alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Keokuk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:24PM CDT until May 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR KEOKUK...WESTERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHERN IOWA COUNTIES... At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Genoa Bluff to Millersburg to near Keswick, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sigourney, Williamsburg, Wellman, North English, Victor, Brighton, What Cheer, Delta, Keswick, South English, Parnell, Millersburg, Harper, Kinross, Keota, West Chester, Webster, Thornburg, Gibson and Keokuk County Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
